  • Portal layout structured content

Portal layout structured content¶

This is the simplest layout. It has a column heading, a subheading, a body and an optional button.

What users see¶

Placement¶

Portal layout structured content are always rendered in the main content block and in the order they are included in the content (except that timeline layouts will always render below).
